name: Solitaire Klondike (itch)
description:
Solitaire Klondike
I started working on this project to help me get back into game dev due to struggling with motivation. I never intended to add stats or online highscores, but after finishing it felt empty. So I ended up adding these extra pieces on top.

** Not every game is solvable **
I might consider adding an easier mode (with no highscores) but I do not attempt to make the game any easier. The chances of winning Klondike is as much luck as it is skill.

Klondike Rules
Rather than write up a bad explanation. The rules can be read here.

Features
* Scoring system
* Compete against the world for the top scores
* Playable on mobile/tablet
* Play stats
* A win animation inspired by the classic Windows Solitaire

Scoring System
Deck to foundation: +10 Points
Deck to tableau: +5 points
Tableau to foundation: +10 points
Turn over tableau card: +5 points
Foundation to tableau: -15 points
Recycle deck: -100 points (does not drop score below 0)
